title: Elevator inspection certificates
dataVerified: Building address, elevator ID, inspector name/license, inspection date, deficiencies
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Inspection status (passed/conditional). Link to elevator inspector/building department system (public and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake elevator certificates. Domain binding verifies elevator inspector/building department. Mandatory posting inside elevator car. Public safety verification. Prevents uninspected elevator fraud. ASME A17.1 compliance.
